title: Things that are consistant throughout any MOBA
body:
Your carry will complain at your support
The guy on your team who instalocks the grab character sucks. Enemy team? He's godlike.
There's always that one fucker laying traps everywhere.
The worse the cosmetic, the more terrifying the player.
Whenever someone is released, expect them to be picked in every single game for at least a week.
At least one guy complaining about foreigners.

Other things you find that always seem to appear regardless of the game?
